title: 5 bedroom mansion in Ajah
description: Beautiful terrace located in a serene environment
details1: Stunning and luxurious three-bedroom apartment in a modern building with concierge in Ajah. The flat is light airy and spacious and fully air-conditioned with all the amenities to make your stay comfortable. Perfectly situated close to two stations as well as local buses through Central London. It is a very stylishly furnished modern and contemporary five-bedroom apartment, featuring a spacious lounge, modern HiFi equipment including wifi, smart tv and cable tv, comfort cooling in all bedrooms and living room, two bathrooms, one ensuite, fully fitted modern kitchen with full crockery and all necessary utensils.

title: 6 bedroom mansion in Gbagada
description: Beautiful terrace located in the centre of Lagos
details1: Whether you are travelling for business or pleasure you will find thus mansion conveniently located within the very popular complex “New Central”. New Central has a mix of retail, office and residential living set across a central piazza. Pedestrian access is via Guildford road. It is within a 5 minute walk to an abundance of retail shops, cafes and restaurants offering cuisine from around the globe, a bowling complex, multiplex cinema, the Ambassador’s theatre and the HG Wells centre.
